main event: A silvery circular object was observed hovering over Susanville, California on September 23, 1963.
interesting points: The object descended rapidly and hovered at a very low altitude for about 5 minutes,The object was described as having a clear and round size and shape with a flashing light at the rear,The observed speed of the object was estimated to be rapid, at least 25 to 30 miles per hour,The object did not produce any sound during the sighting,Several witnesses confirmed seeing the object in the Susanville area.
witness description: The witness was a 52-year-old male electrical engineer interested in UFOs.
